short_summary: One Skid Steer Loader needed by National Historic Site, Fort Langley, B.C.
description: The National Historic Site at Fort Langley requires a Skid Steer Loader. ",
full_summary:
```markdown
### [Skid Steer Loader Tender Announcement](#skid-steer-loader-tender-announcement)

### Title (English)
#### Skid Steer Loader, Fort Langley National Historic Site, B.C.
#### Published Date
#### [2023-07-21](#publishing-date), Amendment Date [2023-08-24](#amendment-date)

### Procurment Category (English)
#### Supply Arrangement (SA)

### Brief Description
#### Parks Canada Agency is seeking a supplier to provide a Skid Steer Loader to the Fort Langley National Historic Site.

####The supplier will be selected based on the lowest price and must be a supplier who holds a Supply Arrangement (SA) under Request RFSA E60HS-19BCKH/A.

### Additional Information
#### The delivery of the goods is expected by [November 1, 2024](#goods-delivery-date).

#### A debriefing may be requested by unsuccessful bidders and will be provided within 15 working days from receipt of notification that their bid was unsuccessful. The debriefing will be in writing or by telephone.

#### Additional details and the request for becoming a pre-qualified supplier under the RFSA can be found at https://canadabuys.canada.ca/en/tender-opportunities/tender-notice/pw-hs-651-78185.

#### The supplier must comply with Regulations of the Canadian Trade Agreement and the Request RFSA.

### Important Dates:
#### **Tender Opening Date**: [2023-08-24](#tender-opening-date), [4:00 PM MST](#tender-opening-time)
#### **Tender Closuring Date**: Not Available

#### **Goods Delivery Date**: [November 1, 2024](#goods-delivery-date)

#### **Attachement**: None

### Contact Information:
#### Terry Imm, Contracting Officer
#### Telephone: [250-837-1659](#telephone-contact)
#### Email: [terry.imm@pc.gc.ca](#email-contact)

**### Note
#### By participating in the procurement process, the company confirms that it understands and agrees to submit to the terms and conditions, and to comply with all applicable laws and regulations relevant to this procurement.

#### This notice has been published as a result of an amendment; review all documentation for additional requirements.

#### This message has been published on Buyandsell.gc.ca.
### ``
